summary: CI tests are being skipped with 'No tests found' errors in the TypeScript SDK build pipeline. The issue manifests in the Windows CI environment, particularly affecting integration and codec tests.
userImpact: Developers cannot verify that their code changes work correctly because CI tests are silently skipped instead of running.
rootCause: Issue with core build preventing tests from being found and executed in the CI environment
resolutionDetails: Maintainer closed the issue indicating the root cause was no longer relevant or had been addressed separately
keyQuote: I don't remember what this is anymore, closing.
